Key Match Events: Gerrit Cole exited the game with a right calf cramp after six innings

Jack Leiter, a rookie pitcher, had his first significant start facing big names like Aaron Judge

Post-Match Reflections: Gerrit Cole commented on his injury and the team's win
Giancarlo Stanton reacted to reaching the milestone
